text: A child with extraordinary powers, you were born into a family with the power to communicate with dragons.
Your uncle became jealous.  He assembled his evil army, the Blackbloods, to murder your family.
You had no choice but to flee.  You and your only remaining friend have been exiled from your home for ten years.
You are no longer a child.  You've returned to bring home all the dragons.  The time for revenge is now.
The world of Atlas is home to powerful dragons. Strong-willed individuals, known as Dragon Lords, form special bonds with these magnificent creatures.
With their dragon companions, Dragon Lords constantly war with each other. They seek resources and dragon eggs to grow in power.
As a child, you left your home to study the world and learn the ways of the Dragon Lords.
Finally, you have returned home. The time has come to take command of your Dragon Keep and forge your future.
"Go forth to Wraithfire Keep and join the siege. The first assaults have begun..."
